title: Performance & Optimization
overview: Ensure your game runs smoothly on low-end devices by managing memory.
objectives: Identify performance killers like Garbage Collection

sections.title: Performance Killers
sections.content:
1. **Object Creation**: `new Bullet()` every frame fills memory.
2. **Garbage Collection (GC)**: Browser pauses game to clean memory.
3. **Draw Calls**: Too many commands slow down GPU.

sections.title: Object Pooling
sections.content: Instead of deleting objects, mark them as `inactive`. When you need a new one, revive an inactive one. This prevents GC spikes.

questions.question: Why does Garbage Collection cause frame drops?
options: It pauses code execution to reclaim memory
questions.correctAnswer: It pauses code execution to reclaim memory

questions.question: What is Object Pooling?
options: Reusing objects instead of creating/destroying them
questions.correctAnswer: Reusing objects instead of creating/destroying them
